timeline.bodyText: use createIdentifier(Location pos, Token token) method to give a name to the missing identifier. otherwise will cause a null pointer exception at the later process.
timeline.author: rdulmina

replies.bodyText:
I see. Then we have to do the same here also?

  
    
      ballerina-lang/compiler/ballerina-lang/src/main/java/org/wso2/ballerinalang/compiler/parser/BLangNodeTransformer.java
    
    
        Lines 583 to 584
      in
      67c6af3
    
    
    
    

        
          
           variableName = NodeFactory.createMissingToken(SyntaxKind.IDENTIFIER_TOKEN, 
        

        
          
                   NodeFactory.createEmptyMinutiaeList(), NodeFactory.createEmptyMinutiaeList());
replies.author: lochana-chathura

replies.bodyText: Ah you are calling createIdentifier(Token token) method at the end which will call createIdentifier(Location pos, Token token). So its fine no changes needed
replies.author: rdulmina

timeline.bodyText: Any issue to track this TODO?
timeline.author: rdulmina
